row.process:
! Attach python file to prepare running : INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.ATTACH_RES
: ATTACH_RES "PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.STORE", "BACKUP_DELETE_SERVER", T : SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&$AGENT_RESOURCES_TASK#pck_websphere_backup_delete_server.py" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE : SET &UC4RB_JYTHON_FILE# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
: INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.SANITY_CHECK
: SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE : SET &UC4_WSADMIN_DIR_PATH# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
: SET &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING# = "&UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY#" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CONVERT_SLASHES_UNIX_STYLE : SET &UC4RB_BACKUP_DIRECTORY# = &UC4RB_CONVERTED_STRING#
: INC PCK.AUTOMIC_IBM_WEBSPHERE.PRV.INCLUDE.BACKUP.DELETE_SERVER : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.CHECK_CMDLINE_CMD@WINDOWS
